Message:
As I laid in the embrace
of the thorny vines,
I had a dream.

It was about a prince
and his knight who came
to save me...
A truly impossible dream.

I knew it wasn’t real, but...
I was almost in tears
at how happy I was in it.

This is what I had
always wanted.

But my dream faded all too soon,
as though it had been taken away
from me.

I opened my eyes to the same
cold basement floor.

The prince and his knight from
my dream were right in front of me!
